question: Which Union Ministry recently set up a new division called the ‘New, emerging and strategic technologies (NEST) division’?
option1: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
explanation: The Ministry of External Affairs recently announced that it would set up a new division under its aegis called the New, emerging and strategic technologies (NEST) division’. The proposed NEST would act as the nodal division under the ministry for addressing the issues related to emerging technologies. It will help our country to closely work with foreign partners in the field of 5G and artificial intelligence. Recently all companies including the Chinese major Huawei were allowed to participate in 5G trials.
